src:
Dodik: SDA jedini remetilački faktor za formiranje novog Saveta ministara BiH

06 Nov 2019, 18:15

Srpski član Predsedništva BiH Milorad Dodik optužio je danas Stranku demokratske akcije (SDA) da je jedini remetilački faktor za formiranje novog Saveta ministara BiH.Dodik je na konferenciji za novinare u Istočnom Sarajevu rekao da je situacija u BiH nepromenjena, mada se spekuliše da postoje neki razgovori oko formiranja vlasti, ali da on za njih, kako je naveo, ne zna."Jedino ako to nije sastanak izmedju SDA i HDZ. Verovatno je na dnevnom redu pitanje formiranja vlasti u Federaciji BiH", naveo je on.Dodik je dalje ocenio da na državnom nivou postoji "paraliza rada na svim nivoima", dodavši da je danas održana sednica Predsedništva BiH na kojoj ponovo nije raspravljano o migranstkoj krizi jer Savet ministara nije dostavio nikakav plan o tom pitanju."Savet ministara nema želje ni mogućnosti ni htenja da reši to pitanje", kazao je srpski član Predsedništva.Dodik je dalje ocenio da je visoki predstavnik Valentin Incko, predstavljajući redovni polugodišnji izveštaj o stanju u BiH, "obmanuo" Savet bezbednosti UN, "iznoseći niz neistina"."On krši svoja ovlašćenja i Dejtonski sporazum, a obmanuo je i Ujedinjene nacije. Degutantno je i smešno da on govori o sporazumu koji su potpisale stranke", naveo je on.Prema njegovim rečima, Incko nema prava da se referiše na sporazume političkih stranaka u BiH, što je juče učinio, niti da ocenjuje šta koja stranka treba da radi.Dodik je još rekao da on neće prihvatiti Godišnji nacionalni program (ANP) za NATO."Onog trenutka kada predate taj plan vi ste se odredili za članstvo, a sam NATO odlučuje kada će nekoga primiti", rekao je on i podsetio da postoji rezolucija Narodne skupštine RS o vojnoj neutralnosti, koja ga obavezuje.
text:
Dodik: SDA is the only disruptive factor for the formation of the new BiH Council of Ministers

06 Nov 2019, 17:15

Serbian Presidency Member Milorad Dodik accused the Party of Democratic Action (SDA) today of being the only disruptive factor for the formation of the new BiH Council of Ministers.Dodik said at a news conference in East Sarajevo that the situation in BiH is unchanged, though there are speculations that some talks about forming the government, but that he did not know about them. "Only if it is not a meeting between the SDA and HDZ. Probably on the agenda is the issue of government formation in the Federation of BiH," he said. Dodik further assessed that there is a "paralysis of work at all levels" at the state level, adding that a BiH Presidency session was held today that did not re-discuss the migration crisis because the Council of Ministers did not submit any plan on the issue. resolve the issue, "said a Serb member of the Presidency. Dodik further assessed that High Representative Valentin Incko, presenting a regular semi-annual report on the The UN Security Council was "deceived" by stating a series of untruths. "It violates its powers and the Dayton Agreement, and it has also deceived the United Nations. It is disgusting and ridiculous that he talks about the agreement signed by the parties, "he stated. According to him, Incko has no right to refer to the agreements of political parties in BiH, which he did yesterday, or to evaluate what a party should do. .Dodik also said that he would not accept the Annual National Program (ANP) for NATO. "The moment you submit that plan, you have opted for membership, and NATO itself decides when to receive someone," he said and recalled that there was a resolution. The RS National Assembly on military neutrality, which obliges it.
